Title: I was inspired during calculus recitation while writing an equation in colors to match the colors of...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I was inspired during calculus recitation while writing an equation in colors to match the colors of a picture I'd drawn: What if math papers had a ton of colored symbols? Instead of debating whether to use p for a prime or a probability I can use ðŸ”´ p and ðŸ”µ p.
